oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Setting up yearly preventive health plan for sheep, goats, camelids
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Miller, Blake
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sheep
goats
camelids
llama
alpaca
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this presentation is to provide useful and ap­plicable information about preventative medicine that can be imparted in an oral or written form to clients that own small ruminants or camelids. Owners often have serious issues re­quiring immediate attention that could have been avoided if proper husbandry and maintenance was provided prior to the incident, further reinforcing the idea that preventative medi­cine is the best medicine.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; No. 55 (2022): 2022 Annual Conference Proceedings; 149-150
